
Acknowledgements
================

Special thanks go out to the following people for their contributions to 
the development and publishing of the IRDAP Python package:

* Julien Milli (ESO Santiago, now IPAG)
* `Christian Ginski <https://www.christian-ginski.com/>`_ (University of Amsterdam)
* Frédéric Vogt (ESO Santiago, now MeteoSwiss)
* Jozua de Boer (Leiden Observatory)
